statement.name: INSERT_SMACST
statement.desc: Inserci√≥n tabla de Centro de costos

statement.name: DELETE_SMACST
statement.desc: Delete tabla de Centros de costos
statement.sql: DELETE FROM SMACST WHERE NROCST=? and CODCIA=?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMACST
statement.desc: Actualizacion tabla de Centro de costos
statement.sql: update smacst set CODPRS=?,CRDCST=?,DBTCST=?,DPNCST=?,EMLCST=?,GRPCST=?,NIVCST=?,NOMCST=?,NPQCST=?,SQLBKR=?,STDCST=?, TIPCST=?,TPODIV=? where CODCIA=? AND NROCST=?
